meanings.definition: To expand or cause to expand excessively.
meanings.sent2: The dough overexpands when too much yeast is added.
meanings.sent3: The bubble gum overexpands in his mouth, making him look like a chipmunk.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement overexpands to fill the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The plant overexpands its roots, breaking through the pot.

meanings.definition: To become or make larger than normal.
meanings.sent1: The city overexpands as more people move in.
meanings.sent2: The waistband of his pants overexpands after a big meal.
meanings.sent3: The snowball overexpands as it rolls down the hill, becoming too heavy to move.
meanings.sent4: His ego overexpands to the point where he can't see his own faults.
meanings.sent5: The balloon overexpands, stretching to its limits before bursting.
